biotools.summary: A visualisation tool for linking function to phylogeny in microbiomes | Interactive visualisation and data annotation for meta-omics data | Chordomics is a tool to visualize and interpret linked data, such as from metagenomics or metaproteomics where both taxonomic and functional data is obtained | The demonstration version of Chordomics is available at https://kmcd.shinyapps.io/chordomics/. Here, a toy dataset is provided to allow you to see the explorative capabilities Chordomics provides before you need to install it!
